TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AccelClearedHandler(object o, AccelClearedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed AccelClearedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the AccelClearedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the AccelClearedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the AccelClearedHandler is removed from the event.
